query.mssql: CREATE TABLE {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256) NOT NULL, [Name] nvarchar(max), [TIN] nvarchar(50), [TRRC] nvarchar(50), [PSRN] nvarchar(50), [Accreditation] nvarchar(30), [TargetEntity] nvarchar(20), [EntityGroup] nvarchar(max), [EntityDetailing] nvarchar(max), [Region] nvarchar(max), [City] nvarchar(max))
